description: Naked Kombat: fighters engage in real combat for three 8-minute rounds, then the winner gets his way with the loser in the final Sex Round. This shoot is the very first time Cole Streets has sex on camera. Tall, slim Cole has little experience with fighting, but his size is a great advantage over his opponent. Patrick Rouge is shorter but more muscular than Cole. This tough Southern boy has a military background - and he will not let up! Don't miss this rough, nasty battle between these sexual gladiators. Will untested amateur Cole be able to hold out against brawny Patrick?
title: Cole Streets vs Patrick Rouge
